model.moves

Class MoveFactory<G extends Game>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.moves.MoveFactory<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the game for which the move will be created.

    public abstract class MoveFactory<G extends Game>
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a move for a game.
